name: Avant-date
description:
A weird and abstract game about the everyday magic of meeting somebody new.

Developed by @awaywardwriter for Nordic Game Jam Online #NGJOnline.

Mac build available at the link. Didn't get it on the page in time, will upload as soon as NGJ allows.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1peQpDNbID61XzNXcnM2kLQB9vyR39tCm/view?usp=shari...
